head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PATTERSON, BERNARD E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PATTERSON, BERNARD E.

block.p: PATTERSON-Bernard E. ''Bernie,'' tragically on September 11th, 2001 at the World Trade Center. Employee of Cantor Fitzgerald. Loving husband of Navila. Cherished father of Kevin, Scott and Anna. Beloved son of Louise and the late Bernard. Dear brother of Owen and Kevin. A Memorial Mass will be held Wednesday, September 26th, 2001 at 11 AM at St. Dominic's R.C. Church, 96 Anstice St., Oyster Bay. In lieu of flowers, memorial donations may be made to either the St. Dominic's Athletic Fields Fund, 110 Anstice St., Oyster Bay or a charity of your choice.
